Bosses.Name: Coeurl O' Nine Tails
Bosses.Strategy: Coeurl O'Nine Tails are encountered twice in the instance. The second Coeurl also spawns two adds.

KeyMechanics.Name: Acid Mist
KeyMechanics.Description: Inflicts paralysis to all players hit.

Bosses.Name: Graffias
Bosses.Strategy: There are puddles of green goo surrounding the arena that inflict the Leaden debuff, slowing movement.

KeyMechanics.Name: Realm Shaker
KeyMechanics.Description: Instant circle AoE around the boss.

KeyMechanics.Name: Silkscreen
KeyMechanics.Description: A line AoE targeting a random player.

KeyMechanics.Name: Sticky Web
KeyMechanics.Description: Targets a random player, spawning an untargetable Fleshy Pod add at their position. The pod will then explode in a circle AoE inflicting any players hit with Poison.
